mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.brand, p.product_name, p.price, p.discount, p.rate, p.color, p.is_light, p.base_type, p.size, p.tag, p.view_count, p.sell_start, p.sell_end, p.product_status, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM store_product p
mapper.insert: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PRODUCT_ID), 1) FROM STORE_PRODUCT INSERT INTO store_product (brand, product_name, price, discount, rate, color, is_light, base_type, size, tag, view_count, sell_start, sell_end, product_status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{brand}, #{product_name}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{rate}, #{color}, #{is_light}, #{base_type}, #{size}, #{tag}, #{view_count}, #{sell_start}, #{sell_end}, #{product_status}, #{created_at}, #{updated_at})
INSERT INTO store_pic (product_id, file_name, is_main) VALUES (#{product_id}, #{file_name}, #{is_main})
